Date: Monday, 5/12/1987
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Darryl Motley

Subject: Contract extension

in my last year of the contract.

I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Jeff Burroughs
